ComicInfo.Summary: World War Hulk II Part I: Amadeus returns from space with his Hulk side now dominant. When Phalkon returns for revenge the Hulk arranges for their fight to be broadcast live; combining his strength and intellect he easily bests Phalkon, claiming to the public that Phalkon's fate is a warning to all of his enemies.
